remarks: If the left and the right limits are equal, the limit of the function exits and the three limits coincide.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
statement:
limcleqr.k $e |- K = ( TopOpen ` CCfld ) $.
limcleqr.a $e |- ( ph -> A C_ RR ) $.
limcleqr.j $e |- J = ( topGen ` ran (,) ) $.
limcleqr.f $e |- ( ph -> F : A --> CC ) $.
limcleqr.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR ) $.
limcleqr.l $e |- ( ph -> L e. ( ( F |` ( -oo (,) B ) ) limCC B ) ) $.
limcleqr.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. ( ( F |` ( B (,) +oo ) ) limCC B ) ) $.
limcleqr.leqr $e |- ( ph -> L = R ) $.
limcleqr $p |- ( ph -> L e. ( F limCC B ) ) $.
